column6: 1. When operating new equipment for the first time I prefer to_Listen to or ask for an explaination
column7: 2. When seeking travel directions I_Look at a map
column8: 3. When cooking a new dish I_Call a friend for explaination
column9: 4. To teach someone something I_Write Instructions
column10: 5. I tend to say_I hear what you are saying
column11: 6. I tend to say_Let me try
column12: 7. I tend to say_You have a go
column13: 8. Complaining about faulty goods I tend to_Phone
column14: 9. I prefer these leisure activities_Music or conversation
column15: 10. When shopping generally I tend to_Try on, handle or test
column16: 11. Choosing a holiday I_Read the brochures
column17: 12. Choosing a new car I_Discuss with friends
column18: 13. Learning a new skill_I talk through with the teacher exactly what I am supposed to do
column19: 14. Choosing from a restaurant menu_I talk through the options in my head
column20: 15. When listening to a band_I listen to the lyrics and the beats
column21: 16. When concentrating I_Move around a lot, fiddle with pens and pencils and touch unrelated things
column22: 17. I remember things best by_Doing and practicing the activity or imagining it being done
column23: 18. My first memory is of_Looking at something
column24: 19. When anxious I_Talk over in my head what worries me most
column25: 20. I feel especially connected to others because of_How they look
column26: 21. When I revise for an exam, I_Write lots of revision notes
column27: 22. When explaining something to someone, I tend to_Explain to them in different ways until they understand
column28: 23. My main interests are_Physical/sports activities or fine wines, fine foods or dancing
column29: 24. Most of my free time is spent_Doing physical activity or making things
column30: 25. When I first contact a new person_I try to get together to share an activity
column31: 26. I first notice how people_Stand and move
column32: 27. If I am very angry_I stomp about, slam doors and throw things
column33: 28. I find it easiest to remember_Things I have done
column34: 29. I think I can tell someone is lying because_The vibes I get from them
column35: 30. When I'm meeting with an old friend_I give them a hug or a handshake
